title: [1.15.2-1.14.4][Autumnity —— 秋原]如秋叶之静美
author: 清秋
txt_content: 本帖最后由 清秋 于 2021-2-7 10:40 编辑 Autumnity —— 秋原 介绍 本模组添加了一些秋天的生物群系，以及一些与秋天相关的内容，包括生物，食物，还有建筑方块。 模组内容 本模组为探索向的模组，你可以尽情在这个美丽的新世界里游玩。 生物群系 群系名称特点描述 枫树林枫树， 枫叶毯， 大型蘑菇， 污秽浆果， 蜗牛 一种秋季树林，其间只长有枫树。生长于此处的枫树有着数种颜色，你还可以在这找到蜗牛。 群系名称特点描述南瓜原野枫树， 大型蘑菇， 蜗牛，南瓜 枫树林的变种，其特征为树木稀少，还有随处可见的南瓜。在此生群系生成的僵尸或骷髅，有可能会带着南瓜头。 生物 火鸡中立生物，火鸡会在枫树林以及南瓜原野中替换原版鸡的生成。当你攻击了火鸡之后，火鸡会一直跟随着你，从动画上看似乎是在反击，但实际上不会造成伤害。击杀后会掉落羽毛和火鸡肉。 蜗牛友善生物，生成于秋原的生物群系。被攻击后会缩入壳内，降低所受到的伤害。小蜗牛长大时会产出蜗牛壳碎片， 这种壳壳可以制成蜗牛壳胸甲，穿上之后，潜行状态下你也会获得伤害减免。喂食其蘑菇可使其产出蜗牛粘液球，喂食其蘑菇煲或者迷之炖菜可以使其繁衍。 建筑方块 大型南瓜南瓜可以被制成大型南瓜块。经过雕凿以及各式加工的大型南瓜块，会在摆放出现不同样式的脸。 此外还添加了一系列枫木和蜗牛壳制成的方块。 杂项 添加了一款胸甲：蜗牛壳胸甲，潜行时获得抗性提升 Ⅲ 以及 +10 的击退抗性。 添加了两种植物：污秽浆果和球番红花，触碰污秽浆果丛会获得中毒效果，吃下污秽浆果会获得秽腐之味效果；球番红花为装饰用 添加了两种食物：枫糖煎饼、熟火鸡肉。 添加了一种药水：延长药水，这种药水会延长你身上所有的药水效果。 兼容模组 Quark               mcmod链接：https://www.mcmod.cn/class/527.htmlExtra Boats      mcmod链接：https://www.mcmod.cn/class/3222.htmlBuzzier Bees    mcmod链接：https://www.mcmod.cn/class/2326.htmlBerry Good      目前无搬运。 授权信息 没错，是Aikini的授权，他最近忙所以把坑给了我 汉化 自带汉化 下载地址   尊重作者，请去curseforge下载：   https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/autumnity/files   前置mod：   https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/abnormals-core 更新日志 v2.0.1 * Added Foul Taste to "How Did We Get Here?" advancement 复制代码 v2.0.0 * Ported to 1.16.4 * Modified advancements to include Autumnity content复制代码 v1.5.0 - Now requires Abnormals Core 2.0.8 or higher Additions: - Added Turkeys - Added Soul, Redstone, and Ender Jack O' Lanterns (including large ones) - Added Snail Shell Blocks - Added Swirl and Maple Leaf Banner Patterns - Added Pumpkin Bread, Turkey, and Turkey Pieces - Added Turkey Eggs - Added Snail crawling sounds Changes: - Changed the Foul Taste icon and made Foul Taste particles orange - Foul Taste now works with Cake, Pancakes, and Yucca Gateau - Foul Berry Bushes no longer poison Snails - Snails no longer take Cactus damage - Snails that are hiding now deflect arrows - Snail Slime is no longer replaceable - Pancakes now output a comparator signal - Slight Maple texture updates - The Foul Berry Pips recipe now produces only one Foul Berry Pip Fixes: - Fixed some Maple blocks appearing in the wrong place in the creative inventory - Fixed water not destroying Snail Slime - Fixed Snails sometimes spawning underwater - Fixed Snails making eating sounds when bred - Fixed mobs not avoiding Foul Berry Bushes - Fixed water fog colors 复制代码 v1.4.1 - Now requires Abnormals Core 2.0.2 or higher复制代码 v1.4.0 - Ported to 1.16.1 - Now requires Abnormals Core 2.0.1 or higher 复制代码 V1.3.3 - Now requires Abnormals Core 1.0.6 or higher + Added a Pirate Speak translation (Credit: Rye) - Snails are now a bit more common - Fixed snails not spawning in maple forest hills - Fixed red maple saplings not being compostable复制代码 V1.3.2 + Added a Latvian translation (Credit: SwanX1) - Replaced an overpowered trade with a new one - Fixed an inconsistency in stripped and sappy maple log textures - Updated translations复制代码 V1.3.1 + Added an icon for the extension effect - Tweaked snail hiding behavior - Updated snail, snail shell piece and snail shell chestplate textures - Fixed snails having 20 armor points when not hiding in their shells - Fixed snail spawn eggs sometimes being white 复制代码 V.1.3.0 Autumnity now depends on Abnormals Core + Added maple signs + Added autumn crocuses + Added two new paintings + Added a Czech translation (Credit: agent0M) + Added a German translation (Credit: Wizqok) - Snails now eat mooshrooms - Tweaked flower generation in maple forests and pumpkin fields - Red maple leaves now generate naturally - Renamed anti-healing to life stasis - Extension no longer extends snail chestplate resistance - Updated translations复制代码 本帖更新记录 2021.2.6 大幅修改帖子排版 2021.2.5 更新帖子 2020.7.22 帖子被移动到了回收区，遂小更一下帖子 2020.4.17 发布该贴
